Title: Annual School Fete
Description: Join us for a day of fun, games, and food at our Annual School Fete. All proceeds go to charity.

Title: Winter Break Notification
Description: The school will be closed for winter break from December 22nd to January 5th. Classes will resume on January 6th.

Title: Parent-Teacher Conference
Description: Parent-Teacher conferences will be held on November 15th to discuss student progress. Please book your slot online.

Title: New Sports Facilities Inauguration
Description: We are excited to announce the inauguration of our new sports facilities on October 5th. All are welcome to attend.

Title: Art Exhibition by Students
Description: Come and admire the creative works of our talented students at the annual art exhibition from November 1st to 3rd.
